name: paper
title: Paper
description: Instapaper add-on for Firefox that sends an article to Instapaper by Shift-clicking a link, doesn't make any noise and is pretty customizable. Great for adding links from one page in a bulk, you just click on each one and there you go. Old-fashioned action button is provided as well.
author: Yegor Timoschenko

preferences.name: username
preferences.title: Username
preferences.description: Instapaper username. Most likely to be your e-mail.

preferences.name: password
preferences.title: Password
preferences.description: Instapaper password, if any. Stored in your Firefox unencrypted. Sent to Instapaper only via HTTPS.

preferences.name: combo
preferences.title: Hotkey
preferences.description: Combination of keys used to save URL of your current active tab. Leave blank to turn it off. You will need to restart your browser. See hotkey syntax: http://mzl.la/1nTyp0M.

preferences.name: modifier
preferences.title: Modifier
preferences.description: Allows to send an article to Instapaper by clicking a link while holding down a modifier key from the list. You will need to restart your browser.

preferences.name: notifications
preferences.title: Notifications
preferences.description: Makes system notifications when you successfully add a link to Instapaper. Discouraged to use since it makes too much noise.

preferences.name: rightClick
preferences.title: Right-click option
preferences.description: Adds a “Send To Instapaper” option to right-click context menu. You will need to restart your browser.
